data.text: Yave wa mambu ma busonga bu ndieti samba ;
Bika ndungunu ama yitotukila kuidi ngeyo
Ka diambu ko tidi fiongunina ntimꞌama,
Mu diambu di mavanga ma batu ;
A Nzambi, ndikutela bila ngeyo wela kuphana mvutu.
Monisa matsiminanga ma luzolo luaku lunneni,
Wukheba banga ngengele yi dieso diaku ;
mu diambu di batu bambimbi beti kundiamisa,
Bakikangidi mintima miawu midi banga matadi ;
Badedikini banga khosi yidi nzala kanzuna,
A Yave, bika wuphukisa mu koko kuaku mu batu ba phila yayi ;
Vayi minu, ndiela mona zizi kiaku mu busonga.
